subject: Term Life Issued In Minutes - With NO Medical Exam
body: American Life Direct has the World's Fastest Term Life Policy.  10 Minutes from now... your term life policy could be in force.  INSTANT APPROVAL and POLICY ISSUED online in 10 minutes! * Get Quote - 1 minute * Online Application - 3 minutes * Instant Approval - 2 minutes * CCard or Check - 2 minutes * Print Your IN FORCE Policy - 7 minutes Total Time = 15 Minutes!  Print out your New Policy immediately  and be secure in the knowledge that your term life policy is in effect. NO paperwork. NO agents. NO appointments. NO hassles. NO waiting. NO red tape. Please visit for all the information         To stop receiving announcements   American Life Direct 27881 La Paz, Suite G-157 Laguna Niguel, CA 92677
